name: BorgataPoker
description:
Take online poker with you everywhere you go! Now you can use your phone or tablet to play for real money with Borgata, New Jersey’s most popular casino. Join players all over New Jersey to play Texas Hold’em Ring Games and Fast Forward Poker. It’s safe, secure and there are games around the clock. Poker in your pocket—any time, anywhere.

Features:

• Available for the iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch
• 24/7 Customer Support
• Easy depositing and withdrawing
• Ring Games
• Fast Forward Poker
• Must be 21 or older to play
